Line15.103673: This darkness is... it clings to you. Tries to drown you... for the Light, we cannot fail.
Line13.103673: I found records here. Murals, books, some scrolls. They tell of this fort's purpose. Sankekur's fate is well known, but to think his body is here...
Line11.103673: His presence clings to every stone inside these walls. Even now, he conjures images, whispers, cowardly illusions meant to test my faith.
